Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE occurs after Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE following Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that are immediately followed by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE events occurring in reimbursement claims for domestic trips (inferred from case context)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that include at least one approval step (e.g., Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION or Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in cases where the total claim amount is below 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities < 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of variants starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and ending with Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE without reaching Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Request Payment' does not happen

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE events that occur more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that directly follow a rejection by a supervisor, administrator, or pre-approver
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE appears after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and before resubmission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average number of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE per case across all variants
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE occurring within two months of the original trip (as per reimbursement policy)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE to total rejections (including all 'Declaration REJECTED by ...' activities)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that are part of rework loops involving three or more submission-rejection cycles
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that ultimately result in successful Payment Handled versus those that terminate unsuccessfully
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE grouped by year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities
